title.rendered: Impilo closes its initial investment pool

content.rendered:
Mannheimer Swartling has advised Impilo in connection with its formation and the subsequent establishment of its initial investment pool.

Impilo is a Swedish domiciled investment company focusing on investments in healthcare and health related businesses. As an investment company, Impilo has a long-term approach to its investments, which is also reflected in its innovative and flexible structure designed to promote long-term growth and value creation (both organic and via acquisitions). The investors in the initial investment pool are mainly institutional investors and the aggregate commitments to the initial investment pool currently amounts to SEK 3 billion.

Impilo was advised by Mannheimer Swartling.
